reference.shortdesc: A delimiter is a character that marks the beginning or end of a section within a syntax diagram.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Typical delimiter characters are parentheses, commas, tabs, vertical bars, or other special characters.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The delim element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the syntax-diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.
